record.dc:title: 120BY13 Ledford Island, Bradley County, Tennessee. Burial 16BY22, an adult female lying in stone box grave.Square -1R9. Direction SW.
record.wpa:narrative: An adult female in good condition, extended on back with head to NW. This burial lay in a stone box of limestone slabs laid on end for the sides, and other slabs laid on top. On the top of this box over the stone was burial 16BY7. About 0.1' to 0.2' of humic soil lay between 16BY7 and 16BY22. There was no evidence of more than one pit which was discovered at datum depth 9.8, about the top of Level 2. It is suggested that 16BY7 may have been purposely placed in the reopened pit.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustration available on file. See photographs 114BY13 and 117BY13.
